name: Gym Runner - The Endless Gymnastics Adventure!
name_original: Gym Runner - The Endless Gymnastics Adventure!
description:
Run, jump, beat the obstacles and slide like a pro-gymnast in this addictive game Gym Runner.

Gym Runner is an exciting game and once you start playing it you will love it!

Choose your gymnast, change her leotard, try to beat records of your friends connected to the Game Center, and earn diamonds to win prizes.
